posts.post_content:
Narrowing my collection a bit, and selling some raw HOF poses.  Open to offers, especially if purchasing multiple cards.  "I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.  

Add $5 for shipping.  Free shipping on purchases of multiple cards.  ppff or check/money order accepted.  Scans are available on my website, 

[url]https://www.t206miscut.com/cards-for-sale[/url]


Sam Crawford (Throwing) - Piedmont -[STRIKE] $135[/STRIKE] SOLD 
Hugh Duffy - Piedmont - [STRIKE]$125[/STRIKE] SOLD 
Hugh Duffy - Piedmont (missing paper) - $60
Johnny Evers (With Bat Chicago On Shirt) - Polar Bear - $120
Hughie Jennings (One Hand Showing) - Sweet Caporal - $80
Bobby Wallace - Piedmont - [STRIKE]$110[/STRIKE] SOLD 
Fred Clarke (Pittsburgh Portrait) - Piedmont - $105
Jimmy Collins (Minneapolis) - Sweet Caporal - $150
Miller Huggins (Portrait) - Piedmont - [STRIKE]$105[/STRIKE] SOLD 
John McGraw (Portrait No Cap) - Piedmont - TRADED
Joe Kelley - Sweet Caporal - [STRIKE]$100[/STRIKE] SOLD
Hughie Jennings (Both Hands Showing) - Sweet Caporal - $120
Roger Bresnahan (With Bat) - Sweet Caporal - [STRIKE]$80[/STRIKE] SOLD
Let me check in on that Joe Kelley, friend...
sold some...dropped prices on the rest!
Dropped prices again.  Feel free to make offers, especially on multiple cards.  thanks!
Joe Kelley has arrived safe and sound. Sweet packaging, brother!
One more bump with price drops.
Kev / will say your packaging was great / communication was awesome / cards on the docket for tomorrow’s mail. Looking forward to it.
Arrived safe and sound, my friend!
